definitions.title: n.pr.loc. 1.
definitions.body: in Judah (house, i.e. temple of Dagon; As. Bit-Daganna COT:Jos 15:41, & i. p. 281) Jos 15:41 (LXX Bagadihl, but LXXL Bhqdagwn)—name appears in mod. Beit Dejân, SE. of Jaffa, but loc. unsuitable, cf. Rob:BR ii. 232.
in Asher Jos 19:27 (LXX Baiqegeneq, but LXXL Bhqdagwn) perh. = Beit Dejen, near Akko, cf. Di.
